Name: Have a N.I.C.E day!
About the game: In 'Have a N.I.C.E. day' you drive on racing tracks that are so narrow that there is not even room for the shade of your car anymore. The tracks have been provided with jumps, loops etc. Fight against opponents who know no mercy. They will do everything they can to prevent you from winning the race. No matter what it takes. Now prepare for battle!
